languages.text: "Я знаю об этом по нескольким перехваченным вокс-переговорам и паре допрошенных ублюдков, но главное — по опыту. Мятежная чернь делает своей кормовой базой семьи, сослуживцев, знакомых. Их же и вербуют, чтобы поддерживать численность. Еще за еретиками числится подлая привычка прикрываться мирным населением как щитом. Надо выкурить их из насиженных мест и лишить ресурсов".

"I know this from a few intercepted vox-exchanges and a couple of scumbags we've interrogated. But first and foremost, I know from experience. Such mutinous rabble always feeds off its families and associates, who also provide a source of recruits to support its ranks. And, of course, there is the heretics' contemptible habit of using the local population as a shield. We need to flush them out of their nests and starve them of resources."
languages.original_text: "Я знаю об этом по нескольким перехваченным вокс-переговорам и паре допрошенных ублюдков, но главное — по опыту. Мятежная чернь делает своей кормовой базой семьи, сослуживцев, знакомых. Их же и вербуют, чтобы поддерживать численность. Еще за еретиками числится подлая привычка прикрываться мирным населением как щитом. Надо выкурить их из насиженных мест и лишить ресурсов".

And, of course, there is the heretics' contemptible habit of using the local population as a shield. We need to flush them out of their nests and starve them of resources."

languages.text: "Das weiß ich von einigen abgefangenen Vox-Übertragungen und aus verschiedenen Verhören. Aber in erster Linie sagt mir das meine Erfahrung. Aufrührer leben immer von ihren Familien und Kollegen, aus deren Reihen sie auch ihren Nachschub beziehen. Und natürlich haben Ketzer die widerliche Angewohnheit, die örtliche Bevölkerung als Schild zu missbrauchen. Wir müssen sie aus ihren Nestern treiben und von ihren Ressourcen abschneiden."
languages.original_text: "I know this from a few intercepted vox-exchanges and a couple of scumbags we've interrogated. But first and foremost, I know from experience. Such mutinous rabble always feeds off its families and associates, who also provide a source of recruits to support its ranks. And, of course, there is the heretics' contemptible habit of using the local population as a shield. We need to flush them out of their nests and starve them of resources."

traits.locale_text: "Das weiß ich von einigen abgefangenen Vox-Übertragungen und aus verschiedenen Verhören. Aber in erster Linie sagt mir das meine Erfahrung. Aufrührer leben immer von ihren Familien und Kollegen, aus deren Reihen sie auch ihren Nachschub beziehen. Und natürlich haben Ketzer die widerliche Angewohnheit, die örtliche Bevölkerung als Schild zu missbrauchen. Wir müssen sie aus ihren Nestern treiben und von ihren Ressourcen abschneiden."

languages.text: « Je l'ai appris en interceptant plusieurs échanges vox et en interrogeant quelques ordures. Mais je le sais avant tout par expérience. Cette racaille séditieuse se nourrit de ses propres familles et associés. Ils y trouvent aussi un vivier de recrues qui viendront grossir ses rangs. Sans oublier bien sûr la détestable habitude des hérétiques d'utiliser la population locale comme bouclier. Nous devons les déloger de leurs tanières et les priver de ressources. »
languages.original_text: "I know this from a few intercepted vox-exchanges and a couple of scumbags we've interrogated. But first and foremost, I know from experience. Such mutinous rabble always feeds off its families and associates, who also provide a source of recruits to support its ranks. And, of course, there is the heretics' contemptible habit of using the local population as a shield. We need to flush them out of their nests and starve them of resources."

traits.locale_text: « Je l'ai appris en interceptant plusieurs échanges vox et en interrogeant quelques ordures. Mais je le sais avant tout par expérience. Cette racaille séditieuse se nourrit de ses propres familles et associés. Ils y trouvent aussi un vivier de recrues qui viendront grossir ses rangs. Sans oublier bien sûr la détestable habitude des hérétiques d'utiliser la population locale comme bouclier. Nous devons les déloger de leurs tanières et les priver de ressources. »

languages.text: «Lo descubrí a raíz de unas comunicaciones interceptadas y del testimonio de un par de granujas a los que interrogamos. Pero por encima de todo, lo sé por propia experiencia. Esta escoria sediciosa siempre se alimenta de sus familiares y conocidos, muchos de los cuales también acaban engrosando sus filas. Por no mencionar la despreciable costumbre que tienen los herejes de utilizar a los lugareños como escudos humanos. Tenemos que hacerlos salir de sus cubiles y privarlos de recursos».
languages.original_text: "I know this from a few intercepted vox-exchanges and a couple of scumbags we've interrogated. But first and foremost, I know from experience. Such mutinous rabble always feeds off its families and associates, who also provide a source of recruits to support its ranks. And, of course, there is the heretics' contemptible habit of using the local population as a shield. We need to flush them out of their nests and starve them of resources."

traits.locale_text: «Lo descubrí a raíz de unas comunicaciones interceptadas y del testimonio de un par de granujas a los que interrogamos. Pero por encima de todo, lo sé por propia experiencia. Esta escoria sediciosa siempre se alimenta de sus familiares y conocidos, muchos de los cuales también acaban engrosando sus filas. Por no mencionar la despreciable costumbre que tienen los herejes de utilizar a los lugareños como escudos humanos. Tenemos que hacerlos salir de sus cubiles y privarlos de recursos».

languages.text: “我是从截获的音阵信息，以及接受审讯的几个人渣口中得知这一点的。不过，最重要的是，这源自我的实际经验。这群暴乱的乌合之众始终需要依靠他们的家人和同伴提供给养，而这些人往往也会成为暴乱分子的新兵来源。当然，卑劣的异端分子也很喜欢用当地居民做挡箭牌。我们必须把这些老鼠赶出巢穴，切断他们的补给来源。”
languages.original_text: "I know this from a few intercepted vox-exchanges and a couple of scumbags we've interrogated. But first and foremost, I know from experience. Such mutinous rabble always feeds off its families and associates, who also provide a source of recruits to support its ranks. And, of course, there is the heretics' contemptible habit of using the local population as a shield. We need to flush them out of their nests and starve them of resources."

traits.locale_text: “我是从截获的音阵信息，以及接受审讯的几个人渣口中得知这一点的。不过，最重要的是，这源自我的实际经验。这群暴乱的乌合之众始终需要依靠他们的家人和同伴提供给养，而这些人往往也会成为暴乱分子的新兵来源。当然，卑劣的异端分子也很喜欢用当地居民做挡箭牌。我们必须把这些老鼠赶出巢穴，切断他们的补给来源。”

languages.text: 「この情報は、傍受したいくつかのヴォックス通信と、尋問した数人の不良から得たものです。しかし何よりもまず、私は経験から知っています。そのような反乱分子の群れは、常に家族や仲間を利用し、彼らが新たな兵士を補充する源となります。そして、異端者たちは地元の住民を盾に使うという、軽蔑すべき習慣があるのも事実です。彼らを巣から追い出し、資源を断って飢えさせる必要があります」
languages.original_text: "I know this from a few intercepted vox-exchanges and a couple of scumbags we've interrogated. But first and foremost, I know from experience. Such mutinous rabble always feeds off its families and associates, who also provide a source of recruits to support its ranks. And, of course, there is the heretics' contemptible habit of using the local population as a shield. We need to flush them out of their nests and starve them of resources."

traits.locale_text: 「この情報は、傍受したいくつかのヴォックス通信と、尋問した数人の不良から得たものです。しかし何よりもまず、私は経験から知っています。そのような反乱分子の群れは、常に家族や仲間を利用し、彼らが新たな兵士を補充する源となります。そして、異端者たちは地元の住民を盾に使うという、軽蔑すべき習慣があるのも事実です。彼らを巣から追い出し、資源を断って飢えさせる必要があります」

languages.text: "Bunu ele geçirilen birkaç voks iletişiminden ve sorguladığımız birkaç serseriden öğrendim. Ayrıca tecrübeyle de sabit. İsyancı ayaktakımı, hayata tutunmak için ailelerinden ve arkadaşlarından beslenir. Aynı zamanda bu insanlardan kendi saflarına destekçi edinirler. Bir de bu kâfirler, yedikleri haltlar yetmezmiş gibi yerel halkı kalkan olarak kullanır. Hepsini teker teker yuvalarından çıkarıp kaynaklarından mahrum bırakmalıyız."
languages.original_text: "I know this from a few intercepted vox-exchanges and a couple of scumbags we've interrogated. But first and foremost, I know from experience. And, of course, there is the heretics' contemptible habit of using the local population as a shield. We need to flush them out of their nests and starve them of resources."
